title: [Badlands, Ravine]
description: Stagnant flood water pools between the rocks of a shallow bend, the roots of a lone oak sipping the moisture jealously.  What little sunlight finds its way down the steep hillside walls is shaded out by the oak, leaving the wide, flat rocks cold as gravestones.

Stagnant flood water pools between the rocks of a shallow bend, the roots of a lone oak sipping the moisture jealously.  What little moonlight finds its way down the steep hillside walls is blotted out by the oak, leaving the wide, flat rocks in almost impenetrable darkness.
